msContents.summary: This is manuscript of the famous Bhāgavatpurāṇa. Some readings and the end verses of the 13th Skandha are different that the published edition of the Bhāgavatpurāṇa available at the Sanskrit documents web site. On the front cover number 101 is written in roman, in pink pencil.

support.p: Brown hard cover. Back cover folio is rough. The brown color layer is damaged. Scratches are seen. In front guard cover is damaged at the left corner. The verso of the guard covers has design of a creeping, flowers and leaves. Flowers are colored with red and rest stem and leaves are with yellow.

extent.measure: 2 guard folios, 9 blank folios, 246 written folios

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin. Folio 244 is also numbered in Devanagari script as the original number is damaged due to torn folio. On 246 folio something is written in Telugu script in the left margin.
supportDesc.condition: Good state. Some folio are torn at the edges. Marginal holes have damaged the folio numbers. At the end number 244 is written in Devanagari in the left margin hence it was possible to know the exact folio number.

avighnamastu | kṛṣṇāya yadavendrāya jñānamudyāya yogine nāthāya rukmiṇaiśāya namonamaḥ vedāntacedine | janmādyasya yato nāvyāditarataścārtheṣvaBijña svarāt te
ne brahmahṛdāya ādikavaye muhyanti yat surayaḥ ||
śrībhāgavataṁnāradam pañcaviṁśati….
vārāhamekāśītisahasrakam ………
ṇa sandohaścaturlakṣamudāhṛtam | tatrāṣṭādaśasāhasryam śrībhāgavatamuttamam | idam bhāgavatam purvaṁ brahmaṇe nābhipañkaje | sthitāya bhavabhītāya kāruṇyātsarvapradarśitam ādima
dhyāvasāneṣu vairāgyakhyānasaṁyutam | harilīlākathāvrātāmṛtānadīta tatsuyam | sarvavedāntasāraṁ yat brahāmātmaikatvalakṣaṇam | vastvadvitiyaṁ tanniṣṭhaṁ kaivalyaikaprayojanaṁ pro
ṣṭhapadyāṁ paurṇamāsyāṁ hemasiṁhasamanvitam | dadāti yo bhagavataṁ sa yāti paramāṁ gatim | rājante tāvadanyāni purāṇāni satām gaṇe yāvanta dṛśyate sākṣātśrrīmatbhāgavataṁ param sa
rvavedāntasāraṁ hi śrimadbhāgavatamiṣyate ………|
nāmidantathā śrīmatbhāgavatam purāṇamamalaṁ yadvaiṣṇavānāṁpriayṁ yasmin pāramahaṁsyametadakhilam tattvaṁ paraṁ gīyante || yatra jñānavirāgabhaktisahitaṁ naiṣkarmmyamāvi
ṣkṛtantacśṛṇvan vipaṭhan vicāraṇaparo bhaktyā vimucyennaraḥ tasmai ye na vibhāsitoyamatulo jñānapradīpaḥ purā tadrūpeṇa ca nāradaya munaye kṛṣṇā
ya tadrūpiṇe yogīndrāya tadāmtanā ca bhagavadrātāya kāruṇyatas ca śuddhaṁ vimalaṁ viśokamamṛtaṁ satyaṁ parandhīmahiṁ | namastasmai bhagavate vāsudevāya sākṣiṇe ya ida
